artist: Artist: Utagawa Yoshitora; Publisher: Yoshidaya Bunzaburō
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: book with binding on the right side; colorful cover with image of a single figure with sword raised in PR hand; explosion on right; vertical red band with inscription in Japanese characters in ULC; inner cover page depicts a battle scene with shadows of fighting figures behind exploding burning buildings; colorful inner pages that depict battle scenes; inscriptions in Japanese characters on back cover
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Collection of Pictures of Battles in Various Places
